verses.roman:
'choṭa-haridāsa' nāma prabhura kīrtanīyā
tāhāre kahena ācārya ḍākiyā āniyā

synonyms: choṭa-haridāsa nāma—a devotee named Choṭa Haridāsa; prabhura kīrtanīyā—a chanter of songs for Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāhāre—unto him; kahena—says; ācārya—the ācārya; ḍākiyā āniyā—calling him to his place.
translation: A devotee named Choṭa Haridāsa used to sing for Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu. Bhagavān Ācārya called him to his home and spoke as follows.
